questions.question_text: To meet the business needs of most organizations, "Common Set" is seeded InFusion for all set-enabled objects with the exception of _________________.

choices.E: receipts created in a lockbox and uploaded
choices.B: receipts created in a spreadsheet and uploaded

questions.question_text: Which three receipts can be automatically applied by a system? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
BDE

https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E83857_01/saas/financials/r13-update17d/faofc/process-customer-payments.html#FAOFC182743

Recommendations for Receipt Application: How It Works
During payment processing, Receivables matches the remittance reference information on your receipts to open transactions, and presents recommendations for which transactions to use for a given receipt application. This recommendation process operates for manual receipts, lockbox receipts, and receipts uploaded using a spreadsheet.

questions.question_text: Identify the dunning letter template set provided by an application.

A Billing Specialist creates an adjustment for an incorrect invoice that exceeds a users approval limit.
What is the status of the adjustment?

discussion.content:
A.
Approval limits: If the adjustment amount is within your approval limits for the currency of the item, the adjustment is approved and the customer balance updated. If the adjustment amount is outside your approval limits for the currency of the item, the adjustment is set to the status Pending Approval until someone with the appropriate approval limits either approves or rejects the adjustment.

https://fga.fa.us1.oraclecloud.com/fscmUI/faces/AtkHelpPortalMain?TopicId=8E0AF2F9A373C1AEE040D30A68816586&_afrLoop=3792345924890040&_afrWindowMode=0&_afrWindowId=null&_adf.ctrl-state=tbn67qkx9_1&_afrFS=16&_afrMT=screen&_afrMFW=1920&_afrMFH=975&_afrMFDW=1920&_afrMFDH=1080&_afrMFC=8&_afrMFCI=0&_afrMFM=0&_afrMFR=96&_afrMFG=0&_afrMFS=0&_afrMFO=0

A.
Use the Create Automatic Billing Adjustments process parameters to manage the adjustment of specific sets of transactions, for example, by remaining amount, due date, transaction type, customer name, or customer account number.

If you enter a remaining amount or percentage range that exceeds your adjustment approval limits, the Create Automatic Billing Adjustments process creates these adjustments with a status of Pending Approval. You can refer these adjustments for approval to an approver with the appropriate limits.

https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/financials/20a/faofc/manage-customer-billing.html#FAOFC113343

questions.question_text:
A Billing Specialist runs the Create Automatic Billing Adjustments program to automatically adjust the remaining balance on open invoices, but some of the amounts have exceeded the Billing Specialist's approval limits.
What would be the result?

choices.A: The program creates the adjustments with a status of Pending Approval for the amount that exceeds the Billing Specialist's approval limits.
choices.B: The program can be run only if the amount is within the Billing Specialist's approval limits.
choices.C: The program creates the adjustments with a status of Rejected for the amount that exceeds the Billing Specialist's approval limits.
choices.D: The program creates the adjustments only for the amounts within the Billing Specialist's approval limits.
